name: unified-diff-demo-dataset
description: Demo dataset for testing unified diff generation and application

testCases.name: Add error handling to simple function
testCases.description: Test adding try-catch error handling to a basic arithmetic function

input.prompt: Add error handling to the function
input.modificationPrompt: Add try-catch error handling to this function that catches any errors and returns null

testCases.name: Add JSDoc comments to function
testCases.description: Test adding documentation comments to a function

input.prompt: Add JSDoc documentation to the function
input.modificationPrompt: Add proper JSDoc comments to document this function's parameters and return value
